notFound.description: APINotFound is a not found empty response

validationError.description: APIValidationError is error format response related to input validation

parameters.description: search only for repos that the user with the given id owns or contributes to
parameters.name: uid

parameters.description: page number of results to return (1-based)
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: page size of results, maximum page size is 50
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: type of repository to search for. Supported values are "fork", "source", "mirror" and "collaborative"
parameters.name: mode

parameters.description: if `uid` is given, search only for repos that the user owns
parameters.name: exclusive

parameters.description: sort repos by attribute. Supported values are "alpha", "created", "updated", "size", and "id". Default is "alpha"
parameters.name: sort

parameters.description: sort order, either "asc" (ascending) or "desc" (descending). Default is "asc", ignored if "sort" is not specified.
parameters.name: order

Text markdown to render

in: body

Is it a wiki page ?

in: body

ServerVersion.description: ServerVersion wraps the version of the server

Status.description: Status holds a single Status of a single Commit

StatusState.description:
StatusState holds the state of a Status
It can be "pending", "success", "error", "failure", and "warning"

Team.description: Team represents a team in an organization

TrackedTime.description: TrackedTime worked time for an issue / pr

WatchInfo.description: WatchInfo represents an API watch status of one repository
